name: delineation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of describing or marking the edge of something: He tried to make a clear delineation between his job and his private activities. They met to discuss the delineation of a permanent border between the two countries. See
delineate
More examplesFewer examplesThe picture is subtle in its delineation of relationships and social detail.There's a clear delineation of responsibility and authority within the team.He is at his best in his delineation of the central character of the novel.
